resources.string:
"Press the play button above to start the floating service: Duration of each word is 1.25 second Progress can be seen on the button Action will be performed if sentence matches
Following actions are supported: bluetooth on bluetooth off wifi on wifi off torch on torch off call home call emergency volume up volume down brightness up brightness down open browser open calendar music play music pause music next stop service
Improve recognition by adding more utterances: Select a word from the list Press the bottom icon Record the word(s) Long press the bottom icon to retrain
More about the project here: https://github.com/theawless/sr-lib https://github.com/theawless/BTech-Project"
